name: GiadaSystem
0:
”Alexa, turn on Giada”
”Alexa, turn off Giada”
”Alexa, set Giada to 50%”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Allows Giada System lamps to be controlled via Alexa devices. 
To finish the skill configuration, Giada System lamps must be configured via the Giada System app that can be downloaded from the store (iOS or Google).
